View Prague Guide » Recently viewed Hostels in Prague, Czech Republic Show Map Hide Map 158 Prague Hostels, 158 available Hostels.com brings you the best selection of cheap accommodation in Prague. Stay in a Prague hostel in the vibrant area of the Old Town, beside Wenceslas Square and around the main tourist areas of Old Town Square where the famous Astronomical Clock is or find a cheap hostel in Prague near the Jewish Quarter, Prague Castle, New Town or Lesser Town. Whether you are an experienced backpacker or simply just looking for a room for the night, our choice of Prague hostels will suit you. Featured Prague hostels are listed at the top of this page.
